title: Kikoku no Curse Holder
original_name: 鬼哭の忌能使い〈カース ホルダー〉
sinopse:
Asake Omito gets involved in a certain incident along with Honoka, a girl he met by chance. That incident: a battle between the Cursed, who are creatures that far surpass humans, and the Punishers, a team to combat them! In such a life-threatening situation, Omito steals Honoka's lips and...!?

(Source: MU)
